text: [My child is in danger!] (cries out) It is the voice of my child! My precious Lily! My imperial kitten!
[I must warn the King!] (gasps) Mind the volcano!
[Oh, this girl seems helpful.] Well, yes, if you call that a-dressing. It isn't my notion of the thing, at all.
[She doesn't understand.] But I don't want it done at all! (groans) I've been a-dressing myself for the last two hours.
[This shawl is so troublesome!] I don't know what's the matter with it! It's out of temper, I think. I've pinned it here, and I've pinned it there, but there's no pleasing it!
[Oh, my poor hair!] The brush has got entangled in it! (sighs) And I lost the comb yesterday.
[What a lovely idea!] I'm sure I'll take you with pleasure! Twopence a week, and jam every other day.
[I should contribute something.] (wringing hands) Oh, ever so much more than that!
[I should ask a question too.] (anxiously) Can you do Division? Divide a loaf by a knifeâ€”what's the answer to that?
